column2: A simple lightbox plugin based on the bootstrap modal plugin.

column5:
Merge pull request #61 from mattlibera/master

Fix for Bootstrap 3.1+

Fix for Bootstrap 3.1+

In Bootstrap 3.1+, the .modal-backdrop class appeared on top of the .lightbox class because they both had z-index of 1040.  I modified the z-index of .lightbox to 1041 so that the lightbox behaves as expected.

Signed-off-by: Matt Libera <matthew@liberawebdesign.com>

Update docs, move to v0.7.0

Thank you to @jamespegg for adding the gallery/next-previous feature. With that we will move to v0.7.0.

Merge pull request #53 from jamespegg/master

Implemented Prev / Next Sliding (Issue #20 & #47)

Implemented Prev / Next Sliding (Issue #20)

New method for sliding between lighboxes (using data-lightbox-slide and
existing carousel markup). Checks whether previous or next lightbox
exists and stops the 'hidden.bs.lightbox' event from firing on
hideModal().

Merge pull request #51 from jbutz/bootstrap3

Bootstrap 3 Compatibility

Added captions

* Added caption support
* Updated docs and README
* Updated tests
* Fixed bug when there is no image

Initial Bootstrap 3 commit

* Bootstrap 3 works for the most part
* NOT compatible with previous versions of bootstrap
* captions do not work yet

Merge pull request #31 from xixixao/fixcenterimage

Fixes centering of lightbox when no image present

Fixes centering of lightbox when no image present

Check whether .lightbox content includes an image before
using the image's size values.

Merge pull request #24 from sgebhardt/master

Merging pull request: Better resizing with the use of a footer

Integrated Travis-CI, Fixed CSS version number, updated js formatting
* Integrated Travis-CI which will do a simple JSHint test. I plan to add more tests later
* Update the version number in the CSS file, I had forgotten to do that
* Fixed the JavaScript formatting according to JSHint

Fixing bugs and updating to a new bootstrap version. Version 0.3
* Fixed Bug #5 - Lightbox didn't position correctly in Google Chrome
* Completed Issue #7 - Updating to boostrap v2.1.1
Oops. Fixing accidental commit of pages to master

Merge pull request #1 from soluzionilogiche/master

Fix of undefined object and new option

Merge pull request #1 from soluzionilogiche/master

Fix of undefined object and new option

Fix of undefined object and new option
- Added control on undefined value which prevented ESC key to work in some cases.
- Added option resizetofit (true|false) it allows to scale images bigger than browser viewport for a complete view.

Fix of undefined object and new option
- Added control on undefined value which prevented ESC key to work in some cases.
- Added option resizetofit (true|false) it allows to scale images bigger than browser viewport for a complete view.
Fixing issue with Chrome not centering correctly
Updating link to v0.1 not master
